css: .adv-countdown-banner { margin: 10px 15px 2px 15px; background: var(--bg-card); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-top: 3px solid var(--text-main); border-radius: 14px; padding: 18px 10px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; text-align: center; gap: 10px; box-shadow: var(--shadow-md); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif; position: relative; animation: slideDownFade 0.6s ease-out; } .countdown-timer { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 6px; } .timer-segment { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; min-width: 48px; } .countdown-digit { font-size: 26px; font-weight: 800; color: var(--text-main); background: var(--bg-body); padding: 6px 4px; border-radius: 10px; width: 100%; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); } .countdown-label { font-size: 8px; text-transform: uppercase; color: var(--text-sub); margin-top: 6px; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 1px; } .countdown-separator { font-size: 22px; font-weight: 300; color: var(--border-color); margin-top: -18px; } .countdown-header { color: var(--text-main); font-weight: 800; font-size: 14px; text-transform: uppercase; } .countdown-message { color: var(--text-sub); font-size: 11px; } .countdown-dismiss { position: absolute; top: 12px; right: 12px; background: none; border: none; color: var(--text-sub); font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; } @keyframes slideDownFade { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-15px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

name: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Alert
html: {{TITLE}} {{MESSAGE}}
css: .adv-alert-banner { margin: 10px 15px 0px 15px; background: var(--bg-card); border-left: 4px solid #ef4444; border-radius: 12px; padding: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); animation: slideIn 0.4s ease; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-left-width: 4px; } .alert-icon-box { color: #ef4444; height: 24px; width: 24px; flex-shrink: 0; } .alert-content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; flex: 1; } .alert-title { font-weight: 700; font-size: 14px; color: var(--text-main); } .alert-msg { font-size: 12px; color: var(--text-sub); } .alert-close { background: transparent; border: none; color: var(--text-sub); font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; padding: 5px; } @keyframes slideIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } window.closeBanner = function() { document.getElementById('dynamic-banner-slot').style.display='none'; }

name: ‚ú® New Feature Promo
html: NEW {{FEATURE_NAME}}
css: .adv-promo-simple { margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; background: var(--bg-card); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-radius: 50px; padding: 6px 12px 6px 6px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); animation: popIn 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275); } .promo-left { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; } .promo-badge { background: var(--text-main); color: var(--bg-body); font-size: 10px; font-weight: 800; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 20px; } .promo-text { font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--text-main); } .promo-action { background: transparent; border: none; color: #3b82f6; font-weight: 700; font-size: 13px; cursor: pointer; margin-right: 5px; } .promo-close { background: var(--bg-body); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); color: var(--text-sub); border-radius: 50%; width: 20px; height: 20px; font-size: 10px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } @keyframes popIn { from { transform: scale(0.9); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

name: üõ†Ô∏è Maintenance Mode
css: .adv-maint-banner { margin: 10px 15px; overflow: hidden; background: var(--bg-card); border-radius: 12px; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); box-shadow: var(--shadow-md); display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .maint-strip { height: 4px; width: 100%; background: repeating-linear-gradient( 45deg, #f59e0b, #f59e0b 10px, #fbbf24 10px, #fbbf24 20px ); } .maint-body { padding: 15px; text-align: center; } .maint-body b { color: var(--text-main); font-size: 14px; display: block; margin-bottom: 4px; } .maint-body p { color: var(--text-sub); font-size: 12px; margin: 0; }
